project_descr: Capacity for Disaster Reduction Initiative (CADRI) 2014-2017. CADRI is an inter-agency partnership that brings together UNDP, OCHA, UNICEF, WHO, FAO, WFP and six observer members, GFDRR, UNITAR, WMO, UNESCO, UNOPS and IFRC.

outputs.output_descr: Enhancing Country Level Capacity for Advancing Disaster Risk Reduction (CADRI). CADRI is an inter-agency partnership that brings together UNDP, OCHA, UNICEF, WHO, FAO, WFP and six observer members, GFDRR, UNITAR, WMO, UNESCO, UNOPS and IFRC.
donor_name: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE
